verses.verse: <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> The <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is my <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> is my <S%H1916>footstool:<s%> <S%H7272><s%> <S%H335>where<s%> is the <S%H1004>house<s%> that you <S%H1129>build<s%> to me? and <S%H335>where<s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H4496>rest?<s%>

For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> things has my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H6213>made,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> things have <S%H1961>been,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but to <S%H2088>this<s%> man will I <S%H5027>look,<s%> even to him that is <S%H6041>poor<s%> and of a <S%H5223>contrite<s%> <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and <S%H2730>trembles<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> my <S%H1697>word.<s%>

He that <S%H7819>kills<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> is as if he <S%H5221>slew<s%> a <S%H376>man;<s%> he that <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> as if he cut off a <S%H3611>dog's<s%> <S%H6202>neck;<s%> he that <S%H5927>offers<s%> an <S%H4503>oblation,<s%> as if he <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H2386>swine's<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> he that <S%H2142>burns<s%> <S%H3828>incense,<s%> as if he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> an <S%H205>idol.<s%> <S%H1571>Yes,<s%> they have <S%H977>chosen<s%> their own <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2654>delights<s%> in their <S%H8251>abominations.<s%>

I <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H977>choose<s%> their <S%H8586>delusions,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H4035>fears<s%> on them; <S%H3282>because<s%> when I <S%H7121>called,<s%> <S%H369>none<s%> did <S%H6030>answer;<s%> when I <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> they did not <S%H8085>hear:<s%> but they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> before my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H977>chose<s%> that in <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H2654>delighted<s%> not.

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you that <S%H2730>tremble<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> his <S%H1697>word;<s%> Your <S%H251>brothers<s%> that <S%H8130>hated<s%> you, that <S%H5077>cast<s%> you out for my <S%H8034>name's<s%> <S%H4616>sake,<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H3513>glorified:<s%> but he shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> to your <S%H8057>joy,<s%> and they shall be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>

A <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7588>noise<s%> from the <S%H5892>city,<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> from the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H7999>renders<s%> <S%H1576>recompense<s%> to his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

<S%H2962>Before<s%> she <S%H2342>travailed,<s%> she <S%H3205>brought<s%> <S%H3205>forth;<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> her <S%H2256>pain<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> she was <S%H4422>delivered<s%> of a <S%H2145>man<s%> child.

<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2063>such<s%> a thing? <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H428>such<s%> things? Shall the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H6213>made<s%> to <S%H2342>bring<s%> <S%H2342>forth<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day?<s%> or shall a <S%H1471>nation<s%> be <S%H3205>born<s%> at <S%H6471>once?<s%> for as <S%H1571>soon<s%> as <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H2342>travailed,<s%> she <S%H3205>brought<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> her <S%H1121>children.<s%>

Shall I <S%H7665>bring<s%> to the <S%H7665>birth,<s%> and not cause to <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth?<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> shall I cause to <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth,<s%> and <S%H6113>shut<s%> the womb? <S%H559>said<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> you with <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and be <S%H1523>glad<s%> with her, <S%H3605>all<s%> you that <S%H157>love<s%> her: <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> for <S%H4885>joy<s%> with her, <S%H3605>all<s%> you that <S%H56>mourn<s%> for her:

That you may <S%H3243>suck,<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with the <S%H7699>breasts<s%> of her <S%H8575>consolations;<s%> that you may <S%H4711>milk<s%> out, and be <S%H6026>delighted<s%> with the <S%H2123>abundance<s%> of her <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5186>extend<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to her like a <S%H5104>river,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> like a <S%H7857>flowing<s%> <S%H5158>stream:<s%> then shall you <S%H3243>suck,<s%> you shall be <S%H5375>borne<s%> on her <S%H6654>sides,<s%> and be <S%H8173>dandled<s%> on her <S%H1290>knees.<s%>
As <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5162>comforts,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H5162>comfort<s%> you; and you shall be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And when you <S%H7200>see<s%> this, your <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H7797>rejoice,<s%> and your <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> like an <S%H1877>herb:<s%> and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H854>toward<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and his <S%H2194>indignation<s%> <S%H854>toward<s%> his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and with his <S%H4818>chariots<s%> like a <S%H5492>whirlwind,<s%> to <S%H7725>render<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> with <S%H2534>fury,<s%> and his <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> with <S%H3851>flames<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>

For by <S%H784>fire<s%> and by his <S%H2719>sword<s%> will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8199>plead<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh:<s%> and the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H7231>many.<s%>

They that <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> themselves, and <S%H2891>purify<s%> themselves in the <S%H1593>gardens<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> tree in the <S%H8432>middle,<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> <S%H2386>swine's<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and the <S%H8263>abomination,<s%> and the <S%H5909>mouse,<s%> shall be <S%H5486>consumed<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For I know their <S%H4639>works<s%> and their <S%H4284>thoughts:<s%> it shall <S%H935>come,<s%> that I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H3956>tongues;<s%> and they shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

And I will <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> among them, and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H1992>those<s%> that <S%H6412>escape<s%> of them to the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H6322>Pul,<s%> and <S%H3865>Lud,<s%> that <S%H4900>draw<s%> the <S%H7198>bow,<s%> to <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and <S%H3120>Javan,<s%> to the <S%H339>isles<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off, that have not <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H8088>fame,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H3519>glory;<s%> and they shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles.<s%>

And they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> for an <S%H4503>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and in <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and in <S%H6632>litters,<s%> and on <S%H6505>mules,<s%> and on <S%H3753>swift<s%> <S%H3753>beasts,<s%> to my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> of them for <S%H3548>priests<s%> and for <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For as the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I will <S%H6213>make,<s%> shall <S%H5975>remain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall your <S%H2233>seed<s%> and your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5975>remain.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that from one <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon<s%> to another, and from one <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> to another, shall <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> that have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me: for their <S%H8438>worm<s%> shall not <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall their <S%H784>fire<s%> be <S%H3518>quenched;<s%> and they shall be an <S%H1860>abhorring<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
